description:
ttyd is a simple command-line tool for sharing terminal over the web.


This release fixes version detection when not building from git repo (#1339), you don't need to update if you don't mind it.Changelog
- Bump to 1.7.7 (
- cmake: add static version back (
The release action now checks the version bump, it will fail if I forget to bump version in CMakeLists.txt.
